channel.title: Server status help
channel.description: Well i got syi'd and my server loses uptime but its on 100% of the time, eventually does my uptime percentage start going up agiain its at 95% is tehre a way i can get back to 99 or 100?

item.title: Server status help
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

The most retarted question of the year.

No seriously…

Do you really mean to ask this question?

Not to be mean but come on…

DUH of course it goes backup it’s simple math averaging.

If its online you get 100%
If its offline you get 0%
Say its online again you get 100%

Add those all together you get 200%

Divede 200% by 3 and get 66% So you are at 66% Keep getting 100s and you’ll be up again

Read full topic
